languages.text: {n}Тварь перед вами — ксенос-паразит, которых Магос Биологис называют медузами. Существа присасываются к мозгу и нервной системе своей жертвы с помощью десятков щупалец, после чего полностью берут контроль над телом носителя. До конца их природа не изучена, однако существует превалирующая версия, что медузы имеют способность накапливать яркие чувства и эмоции из окружающей среды. Как именно и для чего они это делают — остается спорным.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы никогда не видели их живьем, но читали много отчетов, подлинных и ложных, о встрече со странными ксеносами-паразитами. Медузы — так зовут их мудрые Магос Биологис. Видимо, за близкое сходство с настоящими медузами?{/n}

languages.text: {n}The thing before you is a xenoparasite that Magi Biologis call medusae. These creatures latch onto the brain and nervous system of their victim with dozens of tendrils and assume control over the body of the host. Their nature is yet to be fully studied, but the prevailing hypothesis claims that medusae are capable of absorbing strong feelings and emotions from their environment, although the questions of how and why are still a matter of debate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The thing before you a xeno parasite that Magos Biologis call medusae. These creatures latch on to the brain and the nervous system of their victim with dozens of tendrils and assume control over the body of the host. Their nature is not fully studied, but the prevailing hypothesis claims the medusae are capable of absorbing strong feelings and emotions from the environment, although the questions of how and why still remain up for debate.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你面前的这只生物是一种异形寄生生物，生物贤者称之为美杜莎。这种生物会伸出几十条卷曲的触须，吸附在受害者的大脑与神经系统上，并对宿主的身体进行控制。这种生物的特质还有待充分研究，但根据普遍的假说来看，美杜莎可以从环境中吸取强烈的情感与情绪。至于要如何吸收，为什么要吸收，这些问题尚未找到答案。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The thing before you is a xenoparasite that Magi Biologis call medusae. These creatures latch onto the brain and nervous system of their victim with dozens of tendrils and assume control over the body of the host. Their nature is yet to be fully studied, but the prevailing hypothesis claims that medusae are capable of absorbing strong feelings and emotions from their environment, although the questions of how and why are still a matter of debate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你面前的这只生物是一种异形寄生生物，生物贤者称之为美杜莎。这种生物会伸出几十条卷曲的触须，吸附在受害者的大脑与神经系统上，并对宿主的身体进行控制。这种生物的特质还有待充分研究，但根据普遍的假说来看，美杜莎可以从环境中吸取强烈的情感与情绪。至于要如何吸收，为什么要吸收，这些问题尚未找到答案。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lo que tienes delante es el xenoparásito que los magos biologis llaman Medusas. Estas criaturas se agarran al cerebro y al sistema nervioso de sus víctimas mediante zarcillos y toman el control del cuerpo de su anfitrión. Todavía se está estudiando la naturaleza exacta de estas criaturas, pero la principal hipótesis postula que las Medusas pueden absorber las emociones fuertes de su entorno, aunque todavía no está claro ni cómo lo hacen ni por qué.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The thing before you is a xenoparasite that Magi Biologis call medusae. languages.text: {n}目の前にいるのは、生物学賢人がメデューサと名付けた異種寄生体だ。この生き物達は、数十本ある触手で被害者の脳と神経系に絡みついて宿主の体を操る。その性質はまだ十分に研究されてはいないものの、広く知られた仮説では、メデューサは自分の置かれた環境から強い気持ちや感情を吸収する能力があると言われているが、その方法と理由の謎はまだ議論の余地がある。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The thing before you is a xenoparasite that Magi Biologis call medusae. languages.text: {n}Das Ding vor dir ist ein Xenoparasit, den Magi Biologis Meduse nennen. Diese Kreaturen verbinden sich durch Dutzende von Ranken mit dem Gehirn und Nervensystem ihres Opfers und übernehmen die Kontrolle über den Körper des Wirts. Ihre Struktur ist noch nicht völlig untersucht, aber die herrschende Hypothese lautet, dass Medusen starke Gefühle in ihrer Umgebung aufsaugen können, wobei über Methode und Beweggrund nach wie vor debattiert wird.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The thing before you is a xenoparasite that Magi Biologis call medusae. These creatures latch onto the brain and nervous system of their victim with dozens of tendrils and assume control over the body of the host. Their nature is yet to be fully studied, but the prevailing hypothesis claims that medusae are capable of absorbing strong feelings and emotions from their environment, although the questions of how and why are still a matter of debate.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La chose que vous avez sous les yeux est un xénoparasite que les Magos Biologis appellent « méduse ». Munies de plusieurs dizaines de tentacules, ces créatures s'accrochent au cerveau et au système nerveux de leur victime afin d'en prendre le contrôle. Si l'on sait encore peu de choses à leur sujet, l'hypothèse prédominante veut qu'elles soient capables d'absorber les émotions fortes présentes dans leur environnement immédiat, même si le pourquoi et le comment font encore l'objet d'un vif débat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The thing before you is a xenoparasite that Magi Biologis call medusae. These creatures latch onto the brain and nervous system of their victim with dozens of tendrils and assume control over the body of the host. Their nature is yet to be fully studied, but the prevailing hypothesis claims that medusae are capable of absorbing strong feelings and emotions from their environment, although the questions of how and why are still a matter of debate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La chose que vous avez sous les yeux est un xénoparasite que les Magos Biologis appellent « méduse ». Munies de plusieurs dizaines de tentacules, ces créatures s'accrochent au cerveau et au système nerveux de leur victime afin d'en prendre le contrôle. Si l'on sait encore peu de choses à leur sujet, l'hypothèse prédominante veut qu'elles soient capables d'absorber les émotions fortes présentes dans leur environnement immédiat, même si le pourquoi et le comment font encore l'objet d'un vif débat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Önündeki şey, Magos Biyologislerin medüz dediği bir zenoparazittir. Bu yaratıklar, kurbanlarının sinir sistemine ve beynine onlarca filizle yapışarak konağın bedeninde kontrolü ele geçirir. Tabiatları henüz tam olarak araştırılmamıştır ama öne çıkan hipotezlere göre medüzler, çevrelerindeki güçlü duygu ve hisleri özümseme yeteneğine sahiptir. Fakat bunu nasıl ve ne sebeple yaptıkları sorularına hâlâ yanıt bulunamamıştır.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The thing before you is a xenoparasite that Magi Biologis call medusae. traits.locale_text: {n}Önündeki şey, Magi Biyologların medüz dediği bir zenoparazittir. Bu yaratıklar, kurbanlarının sinir sistemine ve beynine düzinelerce filizle yapışarak konağın bedeninde kontrolü ele geçirir. Tabiatları henüz tam olarak araştırılmamıştır ama öne çıkan hipotezlere göre medüzler, çevrelerindeki güçlü duygu ve hisleri özümseme yeteneğine sahiptir. Fakat bunu nasıl ve ne sebeple yaptıkları sorularına hâlâ yanıt bulunamamıştır.{/n}
